mapper.select: select code, title, startdate, enddate, nvl(starttime,'--') starttime, nvl(endtime,'--') endtime, nvl(contents,'--') contents, s_num from SCHEDULE where sysdate BETWEEN startdate and TO_DATE(enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 and code=#{code}
mapper.update: update schedule set title=#{title}, startdate=#{startdate}, starttime=#{starttime}, enddate=#{enddate}, endtime=#{endtime}, contents=#{contents} where s_num=#{s_num}
